name: canvas-notion-sync
description: Chrome extension to sync Canvas LMS assignments with Notion

scripts.check:security: node .github/scripts/check-credentials.cjs && node .github/scripts/check-console-logs.cjs && node .github/scripts/check-dangerous-functions.cjs && node .github/scripts/verify-encryption.cjs && node .github/scripts/check-https.cjs && node .github/scripts/check-permissions.cjs && node .github/scripts/check-csp.cjs && node .github/scripts/check-rate-limiting.cjs && node .github/scripts/check-error-messages.cjs
scripts.check:all: npm run check:security && npm run check:performance
